welcome_message_body: Welcome to Yerevan, the charming capital of Armenia! Get ready to explore the city's rich history, vibrant culture, and delicious cuisine. We hope you have a wonderful time discovering all that Yerevan has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Zvartnots International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Zvartnots International Airport, primarily used for international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
